p:
Jefferson St Louis County to wit: Michael an infant a boy of color who sues by permission of the court complains of Elijah Mitchel of a plea of trespass for that the said Elijah Mitchel on the twenty second day of May in the year 1832 with force and arms made an assault upon the said Michael to wit at the county of St Louis and then and there bruised and ill hated the said Michael and then and ther imprisoned the said Michael and kept and detained him in person without any reasonable or probably cause whatsoever for a long span of time to wit for the span of 12 hours then next following to law and against the will of the said Michael and the said Michael was not at the and before the consulting the said grievances he was and still is a free person and that the defendent then held and detained him in slavery and still holds and detains him in slavery and other
ways to the said plaitiff a did against the of the state and to the damage of the said Plaitiff five hundred dollars and therfore
